body.class: home page-template page-template-page-home page-template-page-home-php page page-id-4 tribe-no-js

div.p:
The mission of the Milwaukee Academy of Science,
an exemplary leader in STEM education,
is to graduate urban students prepared to compete successfully
at the post-secondary level.

video.source: Your browser does not support the video tag.

h3.a: MAS Stands Out with Quick Response to School Closure

li.div: As schools shift to serve students remotely during the COVID-19 crisis, some are emerging as standouts. These schools aren’t stopping …Read More »
All COVID-19 MAS Communication, frequently asked questions and resources are listed in the COVID-19 Updates Tab on the MAS Website. …Read More »

a.title: Permalink to Senior Division I Scholarship Winners

li.div: Our boy’s basketball team is heading back to Regionals this year! The team has worked very hard all year to …Read More »

h2.div: Established in 2000, MAS is a public charter school
serving over 1,200 K4-12th grade students from across the city,
located in the Avenues West neighborhood.

div.p: Non-Discrimination Statement: Milwaukee Academy Science is committed to equal treatment for all individuals. Milwaukee Academy of Science does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, gender, disability, age, religion, sexual orientation, or national or ethnic origin.

ul.li:
DIRECTIONS: Located in downtown Milwaukee in the historic neighborhood district between State Street and Kilbourn Avenue
View Map

div.div: 2020 MILWAUKEE ACADEMY OF SCIENCE • 2000 W. Kilbourn Ave., Milwaukee, WI 53233
